comment._content: This is West Cary Street and Thompson Street.

comment.author: 12173634@N02
comment._content: Wow, brings back memories I never had!  Amazing how empty this looks and now it's almost considered downtown (well at least by the West End-ers).

comment.author: 39233610@N02
comment._content: My father in law Bob Pearson spoke of growing up near the Dude Ranch - he was born on Ellwood Ave in 1928.
